accessories_config_message: Accessories are defined by the plugins you have installed. Refer to the plugin's documentation for further instructions. Accessories are intended to define a single device.
accessories_message: Add and order the accessories that belong to this room.
available_accessories_message: Select the accessories you want to add to this room.
backup_message: Take a snapshot and download your current configuration.
bridge_settings_message: This section identifies Homebridge on the system and in Apple Home.
default_screen_message: Set the default screen to show when logging in.
end_port_invalid: End port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
home_pin_message: The PIN used when adding Homebridge to Apple Home.
home_username_message: The username Apple Home uses to identify Homebridge.
id_message: This section uniquely identifies the user.
interface_settings_message: This section defines the interface look and feel.
invalid_inactive_logoff: Invalid inactive timeout, must be between 5 and 60.
invalid_port_range: Invalid port range the ending port must be greater then the starting port.
language_message: Set the interface language or set it to auto to use the your browser's language.
log_out_after_message: Define how long you stay logged in without activity, in minutes.
name: Name
package_not_found: This package was not found on NPM.
permissions_message: This section defines what this user can do on the system.
platforms_message: Platforms are defined by the plugins you have installed. Refer to the plugin's documentation for further instructions. Platforms are intended to define a group of devices (like a hub).
port_ranges_message: This section is used to control the range of ports that separate accessories (like camera or television) should be bound to.
range_name_message: A port range description used to identify the port range.
security_message: Set or change this user's password here.
service_description_message: Used with the name to help identify the Homebridge on the system.
service_name_message: Used to identify the Homebridge service on the system.
service_port_invalid: Service port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
service_port_message: The port Homebridge runs on, the default is 51826.
setup_admin_account: To start you need to setup the administrator account.
show_setup_pin_message: This will show or hide the Apple Home setup PIN and QR code on the status screen.
start_port_invalid: Start port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
theme_message: Choose a theme for the interface.
unassigned_accessories_message: These accessories are not assigned to a room.
online_help_message: The best place to get help with HOOBS is online. We have many step-by-step guides that can help troubleshoot any issue you may have with HOOBS.
setup_id_message: From the Apple Home app, scan this QR code.
stay_up_to_date: Stay up-to-date. Updating HOOBS helps keep your setup running healthy. Try checking for updates from the system menu.
login_to_update: Please login as an administrator to check for updates.
homebridge_service_not_running: The Homebridge service is not running. Try starting the service. Check the Status screen and if the Homebridge service is not running, click the service menu on the rupper right and click Start Service.
login_to_fix: Please login as an administrator to fix.
dns_cache_stale: iOS DNS cache has gone stale or gotten misconfigured. Try turning airplane mode on and back off to flush the DNS cache.
homebridge_service_clash: The Homebridge service thinks it's paired, but iOS thinks otherwise. Try resetting the connection with the button below. This will delete the persist folder.
homekit_disconnect: This will disconnect Homebridge from Apple Home. You will need to re-pair.
homebridge_stuck: iOS has gotten your Homebridge username stuck somehow, where it's in the database but inactive. Try regenerating the Homebridge username.
temp_units_message: Set the units you want temprature sensors to display.
country_code_message: Set the country code to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
postal_code_message: Set the postal code to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
